statements: SELECT * FROM emergency_calls;
SELECT caller_name, emergency_type FROM emergency_calls WHERE call_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls WHERE emergency_type = 'Fire';
SELECT DISTINCT emergency_type FROM emergency_calls;
SELECT caller_name, caller_phone FROM emergency_calls WHERE emergency_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY caller_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls WHERE caller_name = 'John' ORDER BY call_id DESC;
SELECT caller_name, caller_phone FROM emergency_calls WHERE emergency_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY caller_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_calls FROM emergency_calls WHERE emergency_type IN ('Fire', 'Accident');
SELECT DISTINCT emergency_type FROM emergency_calls ORDER BY emergency_type;
SELECT caller_name, LENGTH(caller_phone) AS phone_length FROM emergency_calls WHERE LENGTH(caller_phone) > 10 ORDER BY phone_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls;
SELECT caller_name, caller_phone FROM emergency_calls;
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls WHERE emergency_type='Fire';
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls ORDER BY caller_name DESC;
SELECT caller_name, caller_phone FROM emergency_calls WHERE caller_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls ORDER BY call_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT caller_name, emergency_type FROM emergency_calls WHERE caller_phone='123-456-7890'
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls WHERE emergency_type='fire' OR emergency_type='medical'
SELECT caller_name, type_name FROM emergency_calls JOIN emergency_types ON emergency_calls.emergency_type = emergency_types.type_name
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_calls FROM emergency_calls
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls;
SELECT caller_name, emergency_type FROM emergency_calls;
SELECT responder_name, responder_phone FROM responders;
SELECT city, state, zipcode FROM locations;
SELECT responder_name, emergency_type FROM responders WHERE emergency_type='Fire';
SELECT caller_name, caller_phone FROM emergency_calls WHERE emergency_type = 'Fire' ORDER BY caller_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT responder_name, responder_phone, emergency_type FROM responders WHERE emergency_type IN ('Fire', 'Accident') ORDER BY responder_name, responder_phone;
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls e JOIN responders r ON e.emergency_type = r.emergency_type WHERE caller_phone = '555-1234' ORDER BY e.call_id DESC;

SELECT r.responder_name, l.street_address, l.city, l.state, l.zipcode FROM responders r JOIN locations l ON r.responder_id = l.location_id WHERE r.responder_name LIKE 'John%' AND l.state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls;
SELECT caller_name, caller_phone_number FROM emergency_calls;
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls WHERE emergency_type='Fire';
SELECT caller_name, address FROM callers WHERE phone_number='123-456-7890';
SELECT count(*), emergency_name FROM emergency_types GROUP BY emergency_name;
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls WHERE call_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM call_logs WHERE call_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT caller_name, phone_number FROM callers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY caller_name ASC;
SELECT e.caller_name, c.phone_number, e.emergency_name FROM emergency_calls e JOIN emergency_types et ON e.emergency_type = et.emergency_name JOIN callers c ON e.caller_name = c.caller_name;
SELECT * FROM emergency_calls WHERE emergency_type IN (SELECT emergency_name FROM emergency_types WHERE emergency_type_id > 2);
SELECT * FROM caller_details;
SELECT caller_name, caller_contact FROM caller_details WHERE caller_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM emergency_types ORDER BY emergency_name DESC;
SELECT call_datetime, caller_id, emergency_id FROM call_details WHERE call_datetime > '2022-01-01';
SELECT responder_id, responder_name FROM responder_details WHERE responder_contact LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM caller_details ORDER BY caller_name DESC, caller_id
SELECT caller_name, caller_contact FROM caller_details WHERE caller_id > 1000
SELECT * FROM emergency_types WHERE emergency_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND emergency_name LIKE '%fire%'
SELECT call_datetime, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM call_details JOIN call_location ON call_details.call_id = call_location.call_id

SELECT caller_name, responder_name FROM caller_details JOIN call_details ON caller_details.caller_id = call_details.caller_id JOIN responder_details ON call_details.call_id = responder_details.responder_id
